summary.p: This manuscript from the British Library was used in the editio princeps of the Vahnipurāṇa. There is a colophon in Sanskrit, giving the copy date. A second colophon, written in Hindi, has been deleted with yellow paste. For more information, see Bhowmik 2012, cxxvii.
The śiber upākhyāna extends from ff. 146v–149r.

msItem.title: Vahnipurāṇa
msItem.incipit: tejomayānām anyonyam ekasmi vividhātmanāṃ bhede vibhinnātā puṃsāṃ trayāṇām astu vaḥ śriye 1
msItem.finalRubric: || || ity ādye vahnipurāṇe ākhyānaśatakīrttano nāmādhyāyaḥ samāpta || || || samāptam itiṃ purāṇam āgneyam || ||
msItem.colophon:
śubhaṃ ||
saṃvat 1646 varṣe asvanisudivijaidaśamī budhavāsare | āgarainagare śrī akavarasāhijalāladīmahamadarājye ||

provenance.p: From the India Office Library collection.

lg.l: śṛṇu rājan_ pravakṣyāmi svamāṃsaṃ śibinā jathā |
dattasvamāṃsaṃ satyaṃ vai purā hy ausānareṇa vā |

satyadānarava jñātvā śibim iṃdrāśuśu
kṣaṇī |
jijñāsārthaṃ same yātāṃ varttamāne mahādhvare |
vahnir bhūtvā kapotas tu hariḥ śyenā puraḥsaraḥ |

śaraṇārthī mahīpālaṃ nili
lpe bhayavihvalaḥ ||
trāhi māṃ pṛthivīpaliny avadaśyenajād bhayāt |
sa tam āśvāsayāmāsa kapotaṃ śaraṇārthinaṃm |

rājānam upaga
myātha syenaḥ provāca saṃvidam |
vacanaṃ śṛṇu me rājan_ kṣudhārttasya kuṭuṃbinaḥ |
dharmātmānaṃ tvām āhur ye pṛthivyāṃ sarvapārthivaḥ |

tadvi
ruddhaṃ kathaṃ karmma karttum ichasi pārthiva |
kṛtaghnā bhavatā dānaiḥ sādhunā sādhavo jitāḥ |
kṣamayā krūrakarmāṇaḥ satyenānṛtavādinaḥ |
sarāgā vītarāgeṇa tathākopena kopayaḥ |
satṛṣṇā vītatṛṣṇena tvayāḥ lokāḥ parājitāḥ |

sarvasya saṃpadaḥ svārthāni parārthās tu kasya
cit |
parārthā bhavato nityaṃ saphalasya naror iva |
napakāraparo py evam upakāravase tataḥ |
apakāraparo pi tvam upakāraparaḥ sadā |
mamaiva vihito dhātrā bhakṣāyaṃ taṃ samutsṛja |
rakṣaṃtam ātmano dharmaṃ kṣudhitasya kapotakaṃ |

sa śyenam āha saṃprāptas trāṇārthā sa
nnidhau mama |
tyāgo syama kathāṃ kuryā tyāgaṃ sadbhir vigarhitam |
lobhā dveṣā bhayād vāpi yas tyajecharaṇāgatam |

brahmahatyāsamaṃ ta
sya pāpam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ |
śāstreṣu niṣkṛtir dṛṣṭvā mahāpātakinām api |
śaraṇāgatahīnasya na dṛṣṭvā niṣkṛtiḥ kvacit |

yathā
tmanaḥ priyāḥ prāṇāḥ sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ tathā |
tasmān mṛtyubhayatrastā rakṣitavyāḥ prayatnataḥ |

janmamṛtyujarāduḥkhair magnāḥ saṃsārasā
gare |
jaṃtavaḥ pariklśyaṃte mṛtyos tasyaṃ tv ime tataḥ |
yaṃ nimittaṃ bhavechekas trāsaḥ krodho bhayaṃ tathā |

āyāśo vāpi tan mūlam ekāṃ na
pi na tat tyajet |
tathā ca te jīvitam ātmanapriyaṃ tathā pareṣām api jīvitaṃ priyaṃ |

saṃrakṣate jīvitam ātmano yathā tathā pareṣām api ra
kṣa jīvitaṃ |
tasmāt tavāhaṃ na samarthaviṣye kapotakaṃ kapotakaṃ vāyabhīti yuktam |

tvaṃ manyase tat karavāṇi sarvam ṛte kapotāt khalu
satyāv atra ||
bhavaṃti sarvabhūtāni āhāreṇa janeśvara |
jīvaṃti parivarddhaṃte āhāreṇa na saṃśayaḥ |

āhāraṃ puṣkalaṃ
kurva cira jīvati māṇabhṛt |
na tv āhāravihīno pi śaknoti jīvituṃ ciram |
bhakṣyād vilopitasyāsya mama prāṇā viśāṃ pate |

visṛ
jya kāyaṃ yāsyaṃti paṃthānam apunarbhavam |
mṛte mayi nṛpaśreṣṭha yatra dārādikaṃ kulam |
vinaśyati kathaṃ dharmo bhavitā te nṛpottama |

dha
rmaṃ yo bādhate martyo na sa dharmaḥ paraṃtapa |
avirodhī tu jo dharmmaḥ sa dharmmaḥ sadbhir ucyate |

tasmād virodhe dharmasya niścitya guru
lāghavam |
manyase gauravaṃ yatra tat kuruṣva nṛpottama ||
ekataḥ kratavaḥ sarve samagravaradakṣiṇāḥ |

ekato bhavabhī
tasya prāṇinaḥ prāṇarakṣaṇam |
nāto gurutaro dharmmaḥ kaścid anyo sti khecarae |
prāṇināṃ bhayabhītānām abhayaṃ jat pradīyate |

va
ram ekasya satvasya pradattaṃ jīvitābhayaṃ
na ca viprasya dattaṃ tu gosahasram alaṃkṛtam |
kāmadhenugavādīnāṃ dātāraḥ sulabhā bhuvi |

abha
vaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo yo dadāti dayāparaḥ |
tasya dehād vimuktasya kṣayo nāsti kutaścana |
dattam iṣṭaṃ tapaḥ satyaṃ tīrthavāsā śrutaṃ tathā |

sa
rvāṇy abhayadānasya kalāṃ nārhaṃti ṣoḍaśīm |
catuḥsāgaraparyaṃtāṃ yo dadyāt pṛthivīm imām |

abhayaṃ yaś ca bhūtebhyo yo dadāti ta
to dhikaḥ |
api tyaje rājyam ahaṃ śarīraṃ vāpy adustyajaṃm |
na tv enaṃ bhayasaṃtrastaṃ tyaje dīnaṃ kapotakaṃ |

yan mamāsti śubhaṃ kiṃci tena janmani janma
niḥ |
bhave trātā mahātmānaṃm ārttināśāya dehinām |
na hy ahaṃ kāmaye rājyaṃ na svargaṃ nāpunarbhavam |

prāṇināṃ dukhatatpānāṃ kāmaye duḥṣa
nāśanam |
yathā stutibhṛtāṃ vāṇīm aham etām udāharet |
satyena tena bhagavān_ prasīdaṃtu maheśvaraḥ |
āhārārthe samāraṃbhas tava cāyaṃ vihaṃgamaḥ |
tad yathaiva tavāhāraṃ manyase ta dadāmy aham |
śyenaḥ prāha mamāhāro na ate tra kapotakam |
ta tyaktvā kāmaye nānyam āhāraṃ rājasattama |

sye
nā kapotam aśnāẏaṃ tisthir eṣā sanātanī |
mā rājan_ sāram ajñātvā kadalāstaṃdham āruha |
rājāpy avocad avyagro vartte nāhaṃ kvacit khaga |
dharmmaśāsttropadiṣṭo yaṃ dharmmaḥ satvadayāparaḥ |
sarvasarveṣu yad dānam ekasatve tu yā dayā |

sarvasatvapradānā ca dayaikātra viśiṣya
te |
sarvavedā na saṃsturyu sarvaśāstrāṇi khecara |
sarvatīrthābhiṣekaś ca yaḥ kuryāt prāṇināṃ dayāṃ |

vāṅmanaḥkarmmabhir ye tu sarvabhūtahi
te ratāḥ |
dayādāśitapaṃthāno brahmalokaṃ vrajaṃti te |
gachan_ tiṣṭhat svayaṃ jāgrad yo hitaṃ na mācaret |

parebhyaḥ sa paśur jñeya ātmano py a
hitaḥ sa vai |
duḥkhinaḥ sukhino vāpi dyāṇino labdhacakṣuṣaḥ |
ātmavat paripaśyaṃti te yāṃti paramāṃ gatim |

prāṇinaṃ madhyamānaṃ tu
yaḥ saktaḥ samupekṣate |
sa yāti narakaṃ ghoram iti prāhur mmanīṣiṇaḥ |
tubhyaṃ hi sumaha
sya tulyāni svamāṃsāni prayacha me |

rājā tam a
bravīt_ hṛṣṭo yan me māṃsāni yācase |
etad yachāmi te sadyaḥ svamāṃsaṃ tulayā dhṛtam |
yat prārthito smi bhadraṃ te priyam etad vadāmi te |
satyadharmaratasyāsya sataḥ sumahadapriyam |
adhruveṇa śarīreṇa pratikṣaṇavināśinā |

dhruvaṃ yo nārjapyayed dharmma socyo mūḍha
cetanaḥ |
yadi prāṇyupakārāya dehe nopayujyate |
tataḥ kim upakāro sya pratyahaṃ kriyate vṛthā |

evam uktvā svamāṃsāni kapotena samaṃ
nṛpā |
utkṛtya tolayāmāsa prahṛṣṭamanasā tataḥ |
tyaktvātmasukhabhogechāṃ sarvalokasukhaikhiṇaḥ |

bhavaṃti paraduḥkhena sādhavo ni
tyaduḥkhitāḥ |
tulayā triyamāṇas tu kapoto vyatir ucyate |
punaś cotkṛtya māṃsāni tataḥ prādāt sa pārthivaḥ |

na vidyate yadā māṃsaṃ ka
potena samaṃ kvacit |
tataḥ prakṣīṇamāṃso pi sādhuḥ sukhayate paraṃ |
yadā tena na tulyaṃ tu sa tulyām āruhat svayam |

aṃtaḥpuravarastrī
ṣu na rājye na ca jīvite |
karuṇasiktacittena tenāpekṣā kṛtā na ca |
paraduḥkhāturā nityaṃ svasuṣoni mahāṃty api |

nāpe
kṣe te mahātmānaḥ sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ |
parārtham udyatāḥ saṃtaḥ saṃtaḥ kiṃ kiṃ na kurvate |
tādṛg apy aṃbudher ttāri jaladais tat prapāyate |
eka eva satāṃ mārgo yad aṃgīkṛtapālana |
dahaṃttam akaror kāḍhe pāvakaṃ padayāṃ patiḥ |

ātmānaṃ pīḍayitvāpi sādhuḥ sukhaya
te param |
hlādayaty āpitān vṛkṣo duḥkhaṃ ca vasate svayam |
atha tasmin_ samārūḍhe puṣpavarṣa papāta va |

devaduṃdubhayo nedu
s tulām auśīnare nṛpe |
tatas tasya tadā dṛṣṭvā vākyavedam abhāṣata
śakrasvarūpam āsthāya dharmarājñe parāṃ sthitim |

iṃdro
ham asmi bhadraṃ te kapoto havyavāhanaḥ |
jijñāsamātau tvā rājann imaṃ deśam upāgatau |

mahākāruṇikeneha ma kṛtam etat supuṣka
lam |
naiva pūrve nṛpāś cakrur na kariṣyaṃti cāpare |
parārthe tyajataḥ prāṇān yā prītir abhavat tavā |

prāṇasaṃśayalubdheṣu na sā śa
prāṇeṣu dehinām |
parārthe yātrakalyāṇī svāśrayārthārthaniṣṭhurā |
tvayy eva kevalā rājan_ karuṇā karuṇāparā |

svakarmapāśaiḥ
sudṛḍhair baddhāṃ kṛcham idaṃ jagat |
tvaṃ jagaduḥkhamokṣārtha baddhaḥ karuṇayā nṛpa |
anāthe vikalā dīne nirddhane thiṃni rogini |
adṛṣṭe dṛṣṭapūrve vā tulyaiva karuṇā tava |
yathābhibhūya sarvāṇi jotīṃ ṣiṣo vatiṣṭhate |

tathābhibhūtakaruṇā tava dharmman avasthi
tā |
akṛtve py āviśiṣṭeṣu dīnān anavamanya ca |
agatvā sadṛśaiḥ sārddhaṃ tvaṃ lokottamatāṃ gataḥ |

ātmaprāṇaiḥ paraprāṇān_ yo naraḥ
parirakṣati |
sa yāti paraṃ sthānaṃ yasmān nāvarttate punaḥ |
prāṇair api tvayā rājan rakṣitaḥ kṛpaṇo janāḥ |

svamāṃsāny api da
ttāni dravye anyeṣu kā kathā |
paśavo pi hi jīvaṃti kevalān_ sodaraṃbharāḥ |
sa jīvati punaḥ ślāghyaṃ parārthaṃ yas tu jīvati |

kiṃ
kiṃ cātra satyaṃ ye saṃtaḥ parānugrahatatparāḥ |
na hi svadehaśāṃtyarthaṃ jāyaṃte caṃdanadrumāḥ |
paropakāraṃ vyāpāraḥ paro yaḥ puruṣaḥ sadā |
sa paraṃ padam āpnoti parād api hi yat padam |
paropakāraikamanā sa sukhāya gataspṛhaḥ |

jagaddhitāya jāẏaṃte sādhavas tv ādaśā
bhuvi |
yat te māṃsāni gātrebhyaḥ samutkṛtāni pārthiva |
eṣā te sāsvatī kīrttir lokān anu bhaviṣyati |

divyarūpadharaś caiva pā
layitvā mahāciram |
sarvān_ lokān atikramya brahmalokaṃ gamiṣyati |
evam uktvā tam iṃdrāgnī janmatus tridaśālayam |

rā
rājā tu atubhiḥ syāṃtaṃ mumude devavat tadā |
ya idaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ śibeś varitam uttamam |

vimuktaḥ sarvapāpebhyaḥ svargalokaṃ sa gacha
ti ||

body.p: || || ity ādye vahnipurāṇe śiber upākhyānaṃ nāma || ||
